param.name: file_id

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.id: Exporting a query site contents file
method.doc: To export the contents of a query site contents file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export parameter on the query contents resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. If the export parameter is included in the URL, the entire file is exported. If no export parameter is included in the URL, JSON data that represents the file contents is retrieved.
